attributes.action: Grant free car tax for all those over the age of 60.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many senior citizens who are currently receiving only the state pension struggle to find money to enable them to have an active social life.  Although there are incentives such as free bus passes these are very restrictive in usage ie times, lack of public transport in rural areas.  If all those over the age of 60 were able to continue driving without paying car tax, the senior citizens would be able to more independent having easier access to public services, opening opportunities for voluntary work and helping those that do not drive. Over Sixties Car Allowance Tax Relief would benefit many.
